The mystery of Pixie 1-2 Punch? And how to learn locked Basic techs?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): The mystery of Pixie 1-2 Punch? And how to learn locked Basic techs?
By Zekira G. Drake on Thursday, March 7, 2013 - 05:46 pm:

OK so I'm thinking of raising a Pixie seriously for the first time.

Two questions:

1.) It's listed in the List of Techs that Pixie's 1-2 Punch cannot be gotten by ordinary means. I was thinking that it's a crossover move from Hare... But I can't be sure. Has the mystery of this move already been solved?

2.) Pixie has chained Basic Moves, and some of them actually look usable. What errantry do I go to to get the locked Basic Moves?

By Jennimason0990 on Thursday, March 7, 2013 - 06:46 pm:

Basic techs can be learned from any course.

As for 1-2 punch, I don't remember what the problem with it was exactly, it's probably meant to be a hare crossover tech, but in the dozen or so pixie main-breeds I've raised I've never unlocked it from errantry, even with pixie/hare. It *MAY* be possible to get it from combining, but I've never tried it.
